com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ads

Interface IVirtuosoAdManager

  • public interface IVirtuosoAdManager
    Virtuoso Ad Manager provides access via the IAssetManager to advert related functionality.

    • Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      fetchAdsForAsset 
      abstract IVideoAdPackage fetchAdsForAsset(IAsset aAsset)
      If available, fetch the advertising package for an asset.
      IVideoAdPackage fetchAdsForAsset(IAsset aAsset)
      If available, fetch the advertising package for an asset. The IVideoAdPackage contains methods to enable fetching the details of each available advert and the playback of the advert(s) through a VAST/VMAP definition.
      Parameters:
      aAsset - The asset for which advertising details are required.
      Returns:
      The advertising package containing details of available adverts, or null if the asset does not support adverts or none are currently available.
      fetchServerAdsForAsset 
      abstract IServerDAIPackage fetchServerAdsForAsset(IAsset aAsset)
      If available, fetch the Dynamic Ad Insertion package for an asset.
      IServerDAIPackage fetchServerAdsForAsset(IAsset aAsset)
      If available, fetch the Dynamic Ad Insertion package for an asset. The IServerDAIPackage contains methods to get the list of cue points for ads contained within the downloaded stream, it also contains a method to report media verification ids back to the server which are contained within the media metadata.
      Parameters:
      aAsset - The asset for which advertising details are required.
      Returns:
      The Dynamic Ad Insertion package containing details of adverts within the asset stream, or null if the asset does not support DAI.
      getSettings 
      abstract IAdvertisingSettings getSettings()
      Fetch the advertising settings object, which can be used to fetch or update settings relating to how and when adverts are fetched for assets marked as supporting them.
      IAdvertisingSettings getSettings()
      Fetch the advertising settings object, which can be used to fetch or update settings relating to how and when adverts are fetched for assets marked as supporting them.
      Returns:
      The advertising settings
      See Also:
      IAdvertisingSettings
